steps.welcome: Welcome to YumYum! Let's learn how to play
steps.board: This is a 3×3 board. Your goal is to get three in a row!
steps.reserves: Each player has 6 pieces: 2 Small(S), 2 Medium(M), 2 Large(L)
steps.selectPiece: Red goes first! Select a medium piece...
steps.placePiece: After selecting, click on the board to place it. Put it in the center!
steps.blueTurn: Now it's Blue's turn. Select a small piece...
steps.bluePlace: Blue places the small piece in the top-left corner
steps.captureIntro: Key rule! Large pieces can 'gobble' smaller pieces!
steps.captureDemo: Look! The large piece covers the small one. Covered pieces don't count!
steps.movePiece: Pieces on the board can also move to other cells!
steps.moveDemo: The large piece moved from top-left to bottom-right!
steps.winning: Get three in a row to win! Look at the diagonal ↗ Red wins!
